item.title: FSCast #266. On reading, mentorship and Braille Advocacy
item.content:encoded: This month on FSCast: Olga Espinola shares her life story, where learning and mentorship go hand in hand. Dave Williams discusses tactile Braille displays and explains some of the advantages of multiline Braille support in JAWS. Elizabeth Whitaker introduces upcoming training opportunities from Vispero. Activate to listen, right-click to download. You can also Read the …

item.title: Join Us to Learn About Multiline Braille with the Dot Pad X and JAWS
item.content:encoded: Vispero and Dot Inc. are excited to present an exclusive webinar highlighting Dot Pad X and JAWS, a powerful combination that puts multiline Braille at your fingertips. Join us Tuesday, January 20 at noon ET for a live webinar, “Dot Pad X and JAWS: Expanding Opportunities with Multiline Braille.” Discover how this portable, versatile multiline …

item.title: Learn Six Ways to Increase Productivity with Braille and JAWS
item.content:encoded: Are you looking for practical ways to get the most out of using Braille and JAWS? Want tips to help you work more efficiently? Join us Thursday, January 15 at noon ET for a live webinar, “Six Ways to Increase Productivity with Braille and JAWS.” What We’ll Cover Celebrate Braille Literacy Month with us as …

item.title: Download the Latest Adobe Reader Update to Resolve an Issue Filling Out PDF Forms
item.content:encoded: A recent update to Adobe Reader introduced an issue that prevented users from filling out PDF forms with screen readers such as JAWS. When navigating a form, keyboard focus did not move from field to field, making it impossible to reach form controls or enter information. Adobe has resolved this issue in their latest update …

item.title: 2025 Year-End Review
item.content:encoded: Thanks to your valuable suggestions and feedback, the Freedom Scientific Training Team provided targeted training and introduced you to new software features and enhancements in 2025. As the year comes to a close, we reflect on a few of them and look forward to 2026. JAWS Turned 30 This year, we celebrated the 30th anniversary …

item.title: FSCast #265. On hosting a radio show, reading documents and developing your professional skills
item.content:encoded: This month, Mitchell Smedley shares his experience hosting his own radio show and serving as president of a college radio station. Quin Gillespie introduces Paperback, a fully accessible ebook and document reader for Windows. Finally, Elizabeth Whitaker highlights upcoming training opportunities from Vispero. Activate to listen, right-click to download. You can also read the transcript.
